verses.roman:
sāta-sampradāye prabhu karena bhramaṇa
'mora sampradāye prabhu'--aiche sabāra mana

synonyms: sāta-sampradāye—in the seven groups; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; karena bhramaṇa—wanders; mora sampradāye prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu is in our group; aiche—in this way; sabāra mana—everyone was thinking.
translation: As Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu walked from one group to another inspecting them, the men in each group thought,"The Lord is within our group."
